[[United States|American]] actress. ==Career== Tesreau is best known for her role as [[Mindy Lewis|Melinda “Mindy” Lewis]] on the [[CBS]] [[soap opera]] ''[[Guiding Light]]'', which she portrayed from 1983 to 1989.<ref name="KT Bio">{{cite web|url=http://www.kristatesreau.com/biores.htm|title=Krista Tesreau: Biography|publisher=KristaTesreau.com|accessdate=February 19, 2009}}</ref><ref name="EW Tesreau">{{cite web|url=http://www.ew.com/ew/article/0,,303078,00.html|title=Taking a Tina Turn|date=July 22, 1994|work=[[Entertainment Weekly]]|last=Carter|first=Alan|publisher=EW.com|accessdate=February 19, 2009}}</ref> In 1987 Tesreau was nominated for a [[Daytime Emmy Award]] for [[Daytime Emmy Award for Outstanding Younger Actress in a Drama Series|Outstanding Ingenue]] for the role,<ref name="Emmy 1987">{{cite web|url=http://www.soapoperadigest.com/Emmys/winners1987/index.html|title=Daytime Emmy Winners & Nominees: 1987|publisher=SoapOperaDigest.com|accessdate=February 19, 2009}}</ref> and received a [[Soap Opera Digest|''Soap Opera Digest'' Award]] nomination in 1988.<ref name="KT Bio"/> Tesreau also played
